name: South Shore Mechanical Services
text: A website for a local Mechanical Contracting company. The app is build with Gatsby and Tailwind and uses a Node Express Lambda function to handle form submissions and image loading.

name: Captains Lakefront Properties
text: A website for a vacation rental company. The application uses the MERN stack and is hosted on Heroku. The app uses AWS S3 for dynamic image loading and a CloudFront CDN.

name: Daily Journal App
text: This is a basic daily journal app. It's meant to be a companion to a note app that writes to markdown. The application has a small form and an upload for markdown to render into a journal page.
